de.fhws.hablame.chatbotbackend.service

Class CategoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhws.hablame.chatbotbackend.service.CategoryService

  • @Service
public class CategoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for the Category and the CategoryRepository. Here we handle all logic which is used to get the Category data from the database.
